author: Special Correspondent
text:
The State Tamil Development Department will conduct district-level competitions for college and school students to motivate them in extra curricular activities and promote Tamil language and literature.

The department will organise essay writing, oratorical and poem composing competitions for college students on January 27 and school students on January 28.

While the competitions for the college students will be held at the Government Arts College, Fort Government Girls Higher Secondary School is the venue for the competitions for school students. The entry forms have already been sent to the college principals and school headmasters and the interested students can contact them. For further information, the students can contact the landline phone number 2417741, a release said.
title: Contests for students
